page.title: 08BROMYARD EXCHANGE AND GALA
page.content: About 200 people have visited {Athis,}but many more French have come to Bromyard. However, many people in the{Twinning Association}have not visited France. The popularity of the {exchange}has remained steady throughout. Both English and French have a very enjoyable experience. Many lasting friendships have been established. The{Gala}is an annual event held one weekend in{July.}Farm produce, livestock and handicrafts are shown and there are stalls representing {local traders. This event was established in the 1960's by the{Chamber of Commerce}to provide a source of entertainment for the people of Bromyard and to put Bromyard 'on the map'. Costs are high so entry fees are collected. Any final profits are donated to{charities.
